page.title: 03SERVICES IN BRAMSHAW AREA
page.content: {EDUCATION.}Apart from a play school run by volunteers for children between 3 & 5 years there are no educational facilities in the area. {RELIGION.}There are two churches in Bramshaw area. 1) St Peters, dating from 1158. 2) Methodist Chapel. St Peters church has to share its vicar with 2 neighbouring parishes. {LAW AND ORDER. }There is no policeman or police station in the area, Lyndhurst police station must be contacted if help is needed. Crime is mostly limited to house burglary stealing from cars in car parks and poaching particularly of deer. {HEALTH.} A surgery is held once a week in Brook from the Lyndhurst practice. There is a home help service & a meals on wheels service providing mid-day meals twice a week.
